_instructions.description: This file configures how Linkup API queries are built for each field. Add custom prompts below for any field name.
_instructions.format: Each prompt should specify EXACTLY what format to return the data in
_instructions.exceptions: Add field-specific exceptions or special instructions in the prompt text
_instructions.examples: See 'address' and 'xLink' for examples of format-specific prompts

company.employees: exact total number of employees (return ONLY the number, e.g., 183000)
company.annualRecurringRevenue: annual recurring revenue ARR in USD (return format: $XXX million or $XXX billion)
company.address: complete headquarters street address in format: STREET, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY (e.g., 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA)
company.linkedinLink: official LinkedIn company page FULL URL starting with https://linkedin.com/company/ or https://www.linkedin.com/company/
company.xLink: official Twitter/X account FULL URL starting with https://twitter.com/ or https://x.com/ (not just the handle)
company.domainName: official company website FULL URL starting with https:// or http://
company.industry: primary industry sector or business category
company.idealCustomerProfile: ideal customer profile target market description
company.name: official legal company name

person.name: full name (First Last format)
person.city: current city and country of residence
person.linkedinLink: LinkedIn profile FULL URL starting with https://linkedin.com/in/ or https://www.linkedin.com/in/
person.xLink: Twitter/X FULL URL starting with https://twitter.com/ or https://x.com/ (not just the handle)
